channel.title: Pages on Aston's Programming Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Aston's Programming Thoughts

item.title: About
item.description: In this blog, I post anything that might help someone, or (hopefully) even inspire. Simplicity is a great virtue but it requires hard work to achieve it and education to appreciate it. And to make matters worse: complexity sells better. Edsger W. Dijkstra
